detectors.description: Lottery.DrawWinnerTicket() (Lottery.sol#72-88) uses a weak PRNG: lastWinner = winner (Lottery.sol#82)
Lottery.IsWinner() (Lottery.sol#150-152) uses a weak PRNG: winnings[msg.sender] > 0 (Lottery.sol#151)
Lottery.DrawWinnerTicket() (Lottery.sol#72-88) uses a weak PRNG: lastWinnerAmount = winnings[winner] (Lottery.sol#84)
Lottery.checkWinningsAmount() (Lottery.sol#97-103) uses a weak PRNG: reward2Transfer (Lottery.sol#102)
